attributes.action: Secure the position of Sir Ian Blair as chief of the metropolitan police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While no-one would wish to see a repeat of the the tragic death of Jean Charles de menezes on the 20th. July 2007 we the undersigned do not want to see the removal of the United Kingdom's most experienced anti- terrorist officer in these most dangerous times.
